00030 #include "SimpleStimulus.hpp"
00031 #include <cmath>
00032 
00037 SimpleStimulus::SimpleStimulus(double magnitudeOfStimulus, double duration, double timeOfStimulus)
00038 {
00039     mMagnitudeOfStimulus = magnitudeOfStimulus;
00040     mDuration = duration;
00041     mTimeOfStimulus = timeOfStimulus;
00042 
00043     mDuration += (mDuration+mTimeOfStimulus)*DBL_EPSILON;
00044 }
00045 
00049 SimpleStimulus::~SimpleStimulus()
00050 {
00051     // Do nothing
00052 }
00053 
00059 double SimpleStimulus::GetStimulus(double time)
00060 {
00061     if (mTimeOfStimulus <= time && time <= mDuration+mTimeOfStimulus)
00062     {
00063         return mMagnitudeOfStimulus;
00064     }
00065     else
00066     {
00067         return 0.0;
00068     }
00069 }
